product_name: Nikwax TX-Direct 2.0 Wash-In Water Repellent Treatment - 34 oz.
long_description: Restore water repellency to your rainwear with Nikwax TX Direct 2.0 wash-in formula. Unlike spray-on treatments, the wash-in application ensures that the entire garment is thoroughly coated for optimal performance. A single treatment lasts through several future washings. Manufacturer recommends cleaning garment prior to treatment. Washing machine safe. Safe for use on Gore-Tex(R), REI Elements(R), Ultrex(R), Entrant(R), SympaTex(R) and eVent(R) laminate fabrics.
short_description: Restore water repellency to your rainwear with Nikwax TX Direct 2.0 wash-in formula.
